Much Birch, Hereford
A deceptively large four double bedroom detached period house set in its own grounds in Much Birch.
A deceptively large four double bedroom detached period house set in its own grounds in Much Birch.
Located in the popular rural village of Much Birch with a Public House, School Catchments and routes to surround Towns and Villages.
Head South on Ross Road until reaching Much Birch. Proceed toward The Axe and Cleaver. Approximately 400 metres before reaching the Axe and Cleaver, there is a small turning left in to an access track for several properties. There is a small red triangle on a post to donate this entrance. Follow the track until reaching the last property.
